thread.title: ‘Daily Show’ host Trevor Noah upgrades from rental to $10M penthouse
thread.title_full: ‘Daily Show’ host Trevor Noah upgrades from rental to $10M penthouse

author: Ameena Walker
title: ‘Daily Show’ host Trevor Noah upgrades from rental to $10M penthouse

organizations.name: sotheby’s international realty the daily show

text: ‘Daily Show’ host Trevor Noah upgrades from rental to $10M penthouse Noah swapped his two-bedroom rental within Stella Tower for the building’s duplex penthouse Rec Photos courtesy Sotheby’s International Realty The Daily Show host Trevor Noah has upgraded from his $15,000/month pad and he only had to move a few floors up to do it. Trading in his two-bedroom rental apartment , Noah is now the proud new owner of a $10 million duplex within the Stella Tower in Hell’s Kitchen, reports the Wall Street Journal (h/t Luxury Listings NYC ). Noah’s new digs affords him three bedrooms and three-and-a-half bathrooms spanning nearly 3,600 square feet. The lower level is a loft-like space with 14-foot ceilings, wall-to-wall windows, and an eat-in chef’s kitchen with all the fancy finished one would expect. The upper level boasts a second living room, only this one leads onto the private terrace. Measuring at an astounding 934 square feet, this massive outdoor space puts some of Manhattan’s full-sized apartments to shame, and naturally, the views are amazing. Other details include an en-suite master bedroom, walk-in closets, and solid oak flooring throughout.
